afterClose.description: Specify a function that will be called when modal is closed completely
afterClose.description_zh: Specify a function that will be called when modal is closed completely

bodyStyle.description: Body style for modal body element. Such as height, padding etc
bodyStyle.description_zh: Body style for modal body element. Such as height, padding etc

closable.description: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the modal dialog or not
closable.description_zh: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the modal dialog or not

confirmLoading.description: Whether to apply loading visual effect for OK button or not
confirmLoading.description_zh: Whether to apply loading visual effect for OK button or not

destroyOnClose.description: Whether to unmount child components on onClose
destroyOnClose.description_zh: Whether to unmount child components on onClose

focusTriggerAfterClose.description: Whether need to focus trigger element after dialog is closed
focusTriggerAfterClose.description_zh: Whether need to focus trigger element after dialog is closed

footer.description: Footer content, set as footer={null} when you don't need default buttons
footer.description_zh: Footer content, set as footer={null} when you don't need default buttons

getContainer.description: The mounted node for Modal but still display at fullscreen. To match React 18 concurrent requirement, getContainer should always return same dom since 4.24.x
getContainer.description_zh: The mounted node for Modal but still display at fullscreen. To match React 18 concurrent requirement, getContainer should always return same dom since 4.24.x

keyboard.description: Whether support press esc to close
keyboard.description_zh: Whether support press esc to close

maskClosable.description: Whether to close the modal dialog when the mask (area outside the modal) is clicked
maskClosable.description_zh: Whether to close the modal dialog when the mask (area outside the modal) is clicked

okType.description: Button type of the OK button
okType.description_zh: Button type of the OK button

style.description: Style of floating layer, typically used at least for adjusting the position
style.description_zh: Style of floating layer, typically used at least for adjusting the position

open.description: Whether the modal dialog is visible or not. Use visible under 4.23.0 (why?)
open.description_zh: Whether the modal dialog is visible or not. Use visible under 4.23.0 (why?)

wrapClassName.description: The class name of the container of the modal dialog
wrapClassName.description_zh: The class name of the container of the modal dialog

events.name: onCancel
events.description: Click the callback of the mask layer or the top right cross or cancel button
events.params: 点击遮罩层或右上角叉或取消按钮的回调
events.description_zh: 点击遮罩层或右上角叉或取消按钮的回调
